short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to see how many times you have visited a user's Reddit profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Adds a visit counter inside a Reddit user profile
- Adds visit counters on the frontpage on user's you already have visited

This makes it easier to see if this is a new user, or an old one you've already inspected

THIS ONLY WORKS ON THE OLD LAYOUT OF REDDIT. 
Since I personally use the old layout, I probably won't be adding this to the new layout - unless a lot of people want it
